statements: SELECT * FROM user_ratings_and_reviews WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT technique_id, rating FROM user_ratings_and_reviews WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT user_id, review FROM user_ratings_and_reviews WHERE technique_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_ratings_and_reviews WHERE rating < 3 OR (user_id = 2 AND technique_id = 5);
SELECT review FROM user_ratings_and_reviews WHERE user_id IN (2, 4) ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT technique_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM user_ratings_and_reviews GROUP BY technique_id;
SELECT * FROM user_ratings_and_reviews WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM user_ratings_and_reviews GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT technique_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM user_ratings_and_reviews WHERE rating > 3.5 GROUP BY technique_id ORDER BY total_reviews DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM user_ratings_and_reviews GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY highest_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM cooking_techniques;
SELECT technique_name FROM cooking_techniques WHERE technique_id = 1;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM user_ratings_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, rating, technique_id FROM user_ratings_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_ratings_reviews WHERE review_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM cooking_techniques WHERE technique_name LIKE 'Grilling%' ORDER BY technique_id DESC;
SELECT technique_name, rating FROM cooking_techniques INNER JOIN user_ratings_reviews ON cooking_techniques.technique_id = user_ratings_reviews.technique_id WHERE user_id = 123 AND rating > 4;

SELECT DISTINCT technique_name, rating FROM cooking_techniques INNER JOIN user_ratings_reviews ON cooking_techniques.technique_id = user_ratings_reviews.technique_id ORDER BY rating DESC, technique_name ASC;

SELECT technique_name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM cooking_techniques INNER JOIN user_ratings_reviews ON cooking_techniques.technique_id = user_ratings_reviews.technique_id GROUP BY technique_name HAVING average_rating > 3;

SELECT technique_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM cooking_techniques LEFT JOIN user_ratings_reviews ON cooking_techniques.technique_id = user_ratings_reviews.technique_id GROUP BY technique_name HAVING total_reviews >= 2 ORDER BY total_reviews DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_ratings;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM user_ratings WHERE technique_id = 3;
SELECT technique_name FROM techniques WHERE technique_id = 2;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT technique_name, rating FROM techniques INNER JOIN user_ratings ON techniques.technique_id = user_ratings.technique_id ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_ratings WHERE user_id = 1 AND technique_id = 3
SELECT user_name, rating FROM users JOIN user_ratings ON users.user_id = user_ratings.technique_id
SELECT user_name, review FROM users JOIN user_ratings ON users.user_id = user_ratings.user_id WHERE rating > 4.5
SELECT technique_name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM user_ratings JOIN techniques ON user_ratings.technique_id = techniques.technique_id GROUP BY technique_name
SELECT user_name, review FROM users LEFT JOIN user_ratings ON users.user_id = user_ratings.technique_id
SELECT * FROM user_ratings WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT technique_name, difficulty_level FROM cooking_techniques;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT rating_id, user_id, technique_id, rating_date FROM ratings_history ORDER BY rating_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM user_ratings GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_ratings WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT user_id, technique_id, rating FROM user_ratings WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_ratings WHERE technique_id IN (SELECT technique_id FROM cooking_techniques WHERE difficulty_level = 3);

SELECT u.username, c.technique_name, ur.rating, rh.rating_date FROM users u JOIN user_ratings ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN cooking_techniques c ON ur.technique_id = c.technique_id JOIN ratings_history rh ON u.user_id = rh.user_id;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_ratings FROM user_ratings;
SELECT * FROM user_ratings_and_reviews ORDER BY date_posted DESC;
SELECT technique_name, difficulty_level, description FROM cooking_techniques WHERE difficulty_level > 3;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT technique_id, average_rating, total_reviews FROM technique_ratings ORDER BY average_rating DESC, total_reviews DESC;
SELECT user_id, favorite_technique_id, date_added FROM user_favorites LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_ratings_and_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC, date_posted ASC;
SELECT user_id, rating, review FROM user_ratings_and_reviews WHERE user_id = 1 AND rating > 3;
SELECT technique_name, description FROM cooking_techniques WHERE difficulty_level = 3 ORDER BY technique_id ASC;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01' AND username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT favorite_technique_id, date_added FROM user_favorites WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY date_added DESC LIMIT 5;
